# netboxbgp_routing_policy_rule (Resource)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `action` (String) * `permit` - Permit
* `deny` - Deny
- `index` (Number)
- `routing_policy` (Number) Reference to foreign ID

### Optional

- `comments` (String)
- `continue_entry` (Number)
- `description` (String)
- `match_aspath_list` (List of Number)
- `match_community` (List of Number)
- `match_community_list` (List of Number)
- `match_custom` (String) Provide a JSON-serialized object.
- `match_ip_address` (List of Number)
- `match_ipv6_address` (List of Number)
- `set_actions` (String) Provide a JSON-serialized object.
- `tags` (List of String)

### Read-Only

- `display` (String)
- `id` (Number) A unique integer value identifying this routing policy rule.
